title: How to Add Cheats to MAME

steps.title: Go to "Pugsy's Cheats".
steps.content: Go to "Pugsy's Cheats". This is a trusted website with many versions of cheats for MAME. [ citation needed ] You can simply search it on a search engine or go to the following address: http://cheat.retrogames.com/

steps.title: After that, click on the "MAME Cheats File" tab.
steps.content: After that, click on the "MAME Cheats File" tab.

steps.title: Once that's completed, click on the version you want to choose.
steps.content: Once that's completed, click on the version you want to choose. I must suggest, however, that you choose the most recent version, as it will include more cheats and be less buggy.

steps.title: Click on the Windows logo on the bottom-left side of your computer screen.
steps.content: Click on the Windows logo on the bottom-left side of your computer screen.

steps.title: Click "Run", which will open up the run executable.
steps.content: Click "Run", which will open up the run executable. Once you've done that, type in "CMD" and press "OK".

steps.title: Type in "Cd (MAME directory)" and press enter.
steps.content: Type in "Cd (MAME directory)" and press enter. No quotation marks unless the directory has a space in it.

steps.title: Type in "Mame -cc" to create the custom configuration file.
steps.content: Type in "Mame -cc" to create the custom configuration file.

steps.title: Where it says "cheating 0", change the 0 to a 1.
steps.content: Where it says "cheating 0", change the 0 to a 1. (this will change it from disabled to enabled.)

steps.title: Open up the file you downloaded.
steps.content: Open up the file you downloaded.

steps.title: Click on the file "cheat.7z" and drag it to the directory.
steps.content: Click on the file "cheat.7z" and drag it to the directory.

steps.title: Open up MAME and test it out!
steps.content: Open up MAME and test it out!
